idea: Sumapan Technologies Pvt Ltd has developed a product RECOS which is a new age proptech in India. It offers cloud based RERA filing compliance automation system for real estate builders and construction developers.
name: SUMAPAN TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Intrade has been formed for the purpose of delivering high end, complex, state aware, technological platform in the financial technology(FinTech) space to largest global institutions. The primary focus client set is banks, large asset managers and corporations to satisfy their requirements for highly bespoke and customised, tailor made technological solutions which can be deployed in a fashion most convenient to the client.


The promotors of InTrade are Industry leading professionals in their respective areas of expertise and intend to bring the best technology globally in FinTech space to the emerging market countries with a launch focus on India.
name: Intrade SDC India Pvt Ltd

idea: NeedSomeIT ventures into the possibilities of simplifying automation processes and management modules of ERPs and to build an intuitive system to control production, supply chain and other administrative tasks for companies engaged in production and manufacturing of various consumables and hardware.
name: IDGAF INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SARVAM group’s core philosophy revolves around improving the overall mental health care ecosystem in the society. The group recognizes the quality gap that exists in mental healthcare delivery across the country and is committed to continuously strive to achieve excellence in this domain. Sarvam group’s initiatives through Neuropsychiatric Centre, Kalka is a an initiative to convert that philosophy into practice.
name: SARVAM GLOBAL LIFECARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: 90 Miles Straight is a SaaS based B2B solution for Logistics service providers as well as consumers. It provides complete automation of freight order execution -from customer/service provider acquisition to freight order booking to real-time tracking to invoicing. It brings both Logistics Service Providers as well as its Users on the same technology platform provided by  90 Miles Straight and thereby aims to build a network of service providers and consumers having seamless connectivity and real time visibility.
name: FLATTOP TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1. To carry on the business of buying, selling, reselling, importing, exporting, transporting, storing, developing, promoting, marketing or supplying, trading, dealing in any manner whatsoever in all type of goods on retail as well as on wholesale basis in India or elsewhere.
2. To carry on the business as exhibitors of various goods, services and merchandise and to undertake the necessary activities to promote sales of goods, services and merchandise manufactured/dealt with/provided by the Company.
3. To act as broker, trader, agent, shipper, commission agent, distributor, representative, franchiser, consultant, collaborator, job worker, export house of goods, merchandise and services of all grades, specifications, descriptions, applications, modalities, fashions, including by-products, spares or accessories thereof, on retail as well as on wholesale basis.
name: PurpleCow Marketing Private Limited

idea:
News Valve is an AI-driven mobile application for controlling the passage of unreliable
content through social and viral media, encouraging the Right to Validated Information.
name: HYPERON TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: BestSource Nutrition Private Limited is a Mumbai based Nutrition company. Under own brand company is selling innovative health supplements and plans to introduce many super foods which will ensure healthy lifestyle at affordable rates to masses. This is one of the few Nutrition company which adopted new technology for marketing and promotion of products. Several dieticians, ayurveda doctors are recommending the products. However there is need to popularise our products in masses.
name: BESTSOURCE NUTRITION PRIVATE LIMITED
